event.title: Today the site of Candelaria is dominated

data.event: Today the site of Candelaria is dominated by the Kinross Gold Candelaria Mine on Mt.
The area where Candelaria developed first attracted notice in 1864 when Mexican prospectors working the area near Mt.

However, word of the find was slow to spread, and Candelaria wasnâ€™t truly a town, or even a camp, until a group of European prospectors, mainly German and Slovakian, came into the area in 1879 and established a camp, which soon became a boomtown.
